ctfs
  • Reference

DBHtransition

Calculates a transition matrix of individuals by diameter categories from two censuses. The missing code (M) is checked in codes field if misscode is set; otherwise, status=M is assumed to mean missing and status=AB is assumed to mean the stem was lost, so there is no dbh. Growth rates above maxgrow and below mingrow are excluded, where max and min are annual increments. (Not tested recently and not part of the supported CTFS R package.)

DBHtransition(data1, data2, dbhbreaks = c(10, 50, 100, 300, 10000),
  maxgrow = 45, misscode = "M")
